Content-Type: text/plain;
	charset="iso-8859-1"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable

OK, thanks, I must've missed the retreat.

Ice filled with pride over her v=
ictory. Lunarpine had always told her that she had the passion to become a =
strong warrior. Her headache died as she ceased useing her mental abilities=
 helping her see straight. The mutant looked around the battlefield for ano=
ther target. The battle was far from over and even though Prowl had come fo=
rward to take command she still fealt the need to apear to be a strong lead=
er. The mutant owl flew toward the ground trying to regain her composure wh=
en the Earth below began to spin sending Ice into an instant state of virti=
go. She blinked and shook her head trying to shake off the feeling of dizzy=
ness. Unsuccessfull the owl plumetet into a tailspin causing her speed to i=
ncrease. She tried to transform but her mind was to jumbled by the effort t=
o think straight. With a hard crash she "landed" on her head and blacked ou=
t. Her internal systems would eventually heal her but until they did she'd =
remain in a deep sleep.
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: Michael Cob=
urn 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Friday, November 02, 2001 8:44 P=
M
  Subject: Re: Another female loseing her mind.


  OOC:  My last post fo=
r Surgital was having him leave and head back to the Decepticon base...
   =
 ----- Original Message ----- 
    From: CYBERWOLF4 
    To: nbwrpg@yahoogr=
oups.com 
    Sent: Friday, November 02, 2001 9:13 AM
    Subject: Re: Anot=
her female loseing her mind.


    OOC:  My 
       This is the last post I=
 can find for the mind battle. I'm not sure if I responded or not so I'll p=
lay it from here.

       
      Surgital tried to fight Ice's mind lock on=
 his.  He was down on his knees, which made small craters in the ground, an=
d holding his fists, trying to shake it off.  

      Ice fealt satisfactio=
n in her latest acomplishment. It wasn't every day a single bot forces a ge=
stault to it's knees. mentally she tried to reach out to any Maximal that c=
ould hear her thoughts. The mutant forced herself through the pain and trie=
d to direct the order to attack while the giant was down. When this battle =
was over she knew she'd need either an asprin or a labotamy to stop the pai=
n.
        ----- Original Message ----- 
        From: CYBERWOLF4 
        =
To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
        Sent: Friday, October 12, 2001 12:57 PM=

        Subject: Another female loseing her mind.


        Surgitals flas=
hback was sent into Ices mind, she saw everything as if it was happening to=
 her. "It's not happening to me, it's not me." she kept telling herself as =
blade after blade struck her mental form. Trying desperately to control her=
 thoughts she shouted another command. "SEPERATE"
         
        Her owl=
 form spun out of control as she hit the ground. Seeing that form cut and b=
eaten she transformed to her mutant robot mode. Her bearlike paws covered h=
er head as a migrane began to form. She tried to be the good leader but her=
 sanity would soon fade if her mind didn't leave Surgital. 
          -----=
 Original Message ----- 
          From: Samir Duran 
          To: nbwrpg@=
yahoogroups.com 
          Sent: Tuesday, October 09, 2001 4:15 PM
        =
  Subject: The Cybers Will Never Rule since Tankor sucks when it comes to s=
pelling and using capitals


          ::Triggerhappy/Skullgrin/Jume/Whee/S=
urgital::
           
          Triggerhappy's finger moved to pull the tri=
gger.  Hell Drak's eyes were closed tight, waiting for death.  But nothing =
happened.  She opened her eyes.  Triggerhappy was hit, and fell to his knee=
s, mouth wide open, shocked, and in pain.  
           
          "You.....=
" Triggerhappy stopped to gasped for air, "Pile of......."
           
    =
      Triggerhappy fell down on his face, so he was laying on the ground.  =
Where his face was, a puddle of mechfluid appeared, and mechfluids started =
spilling from where he had been hit.  The punctures in his metal started to=
 turn into cracks, and mechfluid came out.
           
          Skullgrin,=
 Jume, and Whee watched as Triggerhappy had been supposedly defeated.
     =
      
          "NO!  MY DECEPTIPAL!" Skullgrin shouted.
           
     =
     Skullgrin transformed into Pretender mode, and had his massive, freaky=
 club.  He ran at AzureBlade and threw a lethal blow to AzureBlade's head. =
 Jume and Whee fired at AzureBlade.
           
          "No!  Watch out!"=
 Hell Drak yelled.
           
          A light came into her optics, and =
then she quickly got up and dove at AzureBlade, trying to take him down, bu=
t out of the way of damage...
          ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
          Surgital =
suddenly felt something from Ice.  The mind thing.  Pain.  
           
   =
       "No........not this.......I thought I had forgot about this!" Surgit=
al said, but which Bodicon was saying it, nobody knew.
           
        =
  Surgital didn't feel physical pain, but a flashback showed up, and would =
be visible in the minds of both Ice and all the Bodicons.  It was a flashba=
ck from Decapitron!  
           
          Flashback:  Decapitron was tied=
 to a conveyer belt, with some sort of energon rope.  He was horrified, and=
 was screaming for help.  Then, he went forward, and a bunch of saws and st=
uff came down!  They started cutting at Decapitron.  All he could do was sc=
ream in sheer pain.  Each saw blade had the Autobot symbol engraved on it. =
 Decapitron, still tied onto the conveyer belt, was now heading into a larg=
e box thing.  On the way, a heavy thing with an Autobot symbol came down an=
d sort of crushed Decapitron's head.  Then, Decapitron went into the box th=
ing, which also had an Autobot symbol, and then the doors of the box shut, =
and then Decapitron was stuck, and he was getting beaten and battered.  Aft=
er the 10 minute torture process was done in the box, Decapitron kept going=
.  Mechfluid and oil and stuff were pouring like mad, and he was mangled an=
d dislocated and stuff.  Finally, he was at the end, and was dumped off of =
the conveyer belt and onto the ground.  The last thing he had seen back the=
n when that happened, was Autobots around him, laughing sinisterly with evi=
l eyes and faces.  
          *Flashback Ends*
           
          Surgit=
al was still...
